title: Shooting scene 341 [from 'the spy who loved me']
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Motion picture industry - Study and teaching

description: Filmed on location during the shooting of scene 341 from "The Spy who loved me". An action scene necessitating the construction of a huge and expensive set. Includes fly-on-the-wall footage of direction, rehearsal and shooting of the scene plus commentary from the director (Lewis Gilbert), the director of photography, stunt co-ordinator, and Roger Moore. Produced for Open University.
